          Configuring Homepage Appearance

          Instructions to configure the appearance of homepage in themes.

          1. From the left menu select:

          For all theme versions For PRO theme options only
          Appearance > Customize Appearance > Theme Options

          2. When the menu opens, select Homepage.

          3. Configure the following options:

          NOTE: The following options are only applicable if you select Your latest posts option in Settings > Reading. Refer to Reading Settings for details.

          Click this To configure this
          Top Posts Display the Top Posts sectionEnter section titleEnter section descriptionFilter categories to show the postsSelect the animation effect
          Category Tabs Display the Category Tabs sectionFilter categories to show the posts
          Featured Post Display the Featured Post sectionSelect the background imageSelect the featured postSelect the animation effect
          Content Posts Display the Content Posts sectionEnter section titleEnter section descriptionFilter categories to show the postsEnter the posts margin
          Portfolio Display the Portfolio sectionShow lightbox or link to postEnter the section titleEnter the section descriptionFilter categories to show the postsSelect the animation effect
          Contact Display the Contact sectionSelect the background imageEnter the section titleEnter the section descriptionEnter the contact name, address and e-mailDisplay contact e-mail and contact formSelect the animation effect
          Links Display Twitter icon and enter the Twitter profile URLDisplay Facebook icon and enter the Facebook profile URLDisplay RSS icon and enter the RSS profile URLDisplay YouTube icon and enter the YouTube profile URLDisplay Google+ icon and enter the Google+ profile URLDisplay Instagram icon and enter the Instagram profile URLDisplay LinkedIn icon and enter the LinkedIn profile URL

          4. Click the Save & Publish button to save your changes.
